main.name: Thandiwe Nqobizitha Mobhanga
main.description: Aspiring Chief Marketing Officer (CMO) with a passion for Digital Marketing, currently studying Communication in the North-West University. Looking to gain experience in the digital marketing space while leveraging creativity, analytical skills, and a strong work ethic
main.bio: I am a driven student from Mafikeng, North West, currently studying Communication in the North-West University. My passion for Digital Marketing has grown as I actively pursue opportunities to manage social media for local businesses, gaining hands-on experience in content creation, audience engagement, and brand visibility. On the eduKemet platform, I am eager to further expand my digital marketing skills through its gamified learning approach. I see eduKemet as the ideal place to sharpen my abilities while earning badges, points, and recognitionâ€”keeping me motivated and engaged as I work toward my goal of becoming a Chief Marketing Officer (CMO). My father named me Nqobizitha, which directly translates to 'Conqueror of enemies' as a result nothing can stand in my way of my success.
main.contactmessage: Leave a message here if you want to get in contact with me.

resume.skillmessage: I possess a growing proficiency in Digital Marketing, particularly in social media management, content creation, and audience engagement strategies. I have demonstrated strong leadership abilities through my role in school projects and club activities. My creativity allows me to develop innovative marketing campaigns, while what I study in Economics have honed my analytical thinking. I also have excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, making me a well-rounded candidate for marketing-related opportunities.

education.description: I was  Consistently ranked in the top 10 of the class for Economics and Business Studies, a member of the school's Entrepreneurship Club, and a member of the school's Debating Team.

work.title: Digital Marketing Intern
work.description: I worked under the supervision of my Dad, the then CTO in boosting the company's clients' digital footprint. I also worked on the company's website and social media platforms and thats when the love for Digital Marketing grew.
